H0.text: Which tennis player was dubbed ‘Superbrat’ by the British press. Ilie Nastase

H1.text: Which tennis player was dubbed ‘Superbrat’ by the British press. Jimmy Connors

H2.text: Which tennis player was dubbed ‘Superbrat’ by the British press. Bjorn Borg

H3.text: Which tennis player was dubbed ‘Superbrat’ by the British press. Johnny Mac

A4.text: His brash behavior both on and off the court earned him a reputation as the brat of the tennis world.
